CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1957, pg. 24 reads: "Bermuda Shorts Winners - These pretty young lassies were winners at the Bermuda Ball held at the Fort Pitt Hotel. Left to right, they are Bettilou Finney, second; Barbara Scott, first, and Betty Givens, third. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Bettilou Finney, Barbara Scott, and Betty Givens, holding trophies, posed around fountain in Fort Pitt Hotel for Bermuda Ball
